scripts.dev: export NODE_ENV=development && node_modules/.bin/concurrently --prefix none "npm run dev:example-api" "npm run dev:example-front"
scripts.publish:front: cd packages/front && vite build --mode production && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:api: npm version patch -w yaml-admin-api --no-git-tag-version && npm publish -w yaml-admin-api --access public
scripts.publish: npm run publish:api && npm run publish:front
scripts.install: npm --prefix example/api1 i && npm --prefix example/front1 i && npm --prefix packages/api i && npm --prefix packages/front i
